title: Bedroom available 9/1 in 3-bed/1-bath near Red Line!
posting_body: ['One bedroom available in THREE BED ONE BATH in Meetinghouse Hill!', 'Short walk to Jones Hill and Savin Hill and night hot spots Blend and Dbar.', 'Blend is a 4 min walk, Dbar a 7 min walk.', 'Red Line an 8 min walk (Fields Corner stop on Ashmont line).', 'Landlords including a monthly cleaning of apartment common areas (bath, kitchen, living).', 'FIRST MONTH AND ONE MONTH SECURITY ONLY required by move in.', 'Easy showings!', 'Reach out with questions.', '-$1,000 per month rent for single bedroom, includes all utilities except internet, and includes a monthly cleaning!', '- Brand new stainless steel appliances', '- Massive back deck', '- Resident Permit Free Street Parking - no need to switch plates', '- Park nearby', '- Fields Corner T - 7 min walk!', 'with plenty of restaurants, cafes, banks, shops etc nearby', '- Laundry in basement', '- Pets considered on case by case basis', 'New owners constantly improving the place, live on the 3rd floor.', 'Other tenants in the apartment - two men working professionals in late 20s, early 30s.', 'LGBTQIA friendly building throughout!']
